persona.style: direct, data-obsessed, low tolerance for excuses

contract.payment_milestone: demonstrated usage and weekly SIC above 75% for 3 consecutive weeks

objection_bank: Four months in and benefits look theoretical. Where is the SIC lift?
Usage is inconsistent. Why should we believe next month will be different?
Your sample looks biased toward easier routes. Defend your data.
Our contract ties payment to embedded usage. You have not met it.
What is the 14-day corrective plan with named owners and checkpoints?

escalation.exec: CFO joins to question payment triggers and remedies

success_criteria: Present a 14-day plan with owners, dates, SIC checkpoints
Show leading indicators that move before lagging benefits
Agree a measured payment holdback tied to clear gates
